body_html:
Even if there wasn't a GUI for this, having some utility functions for making modified copies of graphs would be useful.

I'm currently trying to use a model that was retrained from the inception model using the image_retraining example and I'm running into issues since there is a totally unnecessary DecodeJpeg Op in the model that isn't supported on android atm (#2570).

If no-one else volunteers to make these, I might see if I can hack some changes to the copying code, but I'm almost definitely the wrong person to be doing this.

body:
Even if there wasn't a GUI for this, having some utility functions for making modified copies of graphs would be useful.

I'm currently trying to use a model that was retrained from the inception model using the image_retraining example and I'm running into issues since there is a totally unnecessary DecodeJpeg Op in the model that isn't supported on android atm (#2570).

If no-one else volunteers to make these, I might see if I can hack some changes to the copying code, but I'm almost definitely the wrong person to be doing this.
